title: Find area of a right angled triangle
contentHtml:
Write a program to find area of a right angled triangle

Area of right angled triangle = 0.5 × Base × Height

Base   : 2
Height : 3

Area : 3

#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
    int b, h;
    float area;
    scanf("%d %d", &b, &h);
    area = 0.5 * b * h;
    printf("%f\n", area);
    return 0;
}

        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
